content.question: Which of the following best describes why ice was used during this experiment?

choices.label: To increase the activity of the enzyme
To retard the breakdown of the catalase
To purge the solution of excess air trapped during blending
To slow the catalase molecules to increase the probability of contact with the hydrogen peroxide molecules
To increase the size of the active site on the enzyme

content.answer: To retard the breakdown of the catalase

skill.text: 3.C: Identify experimental procedures that align with the question, including: i. identifying dependent and independent variables ii. identifying appropriate controls iii. justifying appropriate controls
